game.name: iKun Go Go Go
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이것은 연습생을 주제로 한 2D 플랫포머로, 클래식 게임 'NS-Shaft'에서 영감을 받았습니다. 당신은 아이돌 꿈을 품은 연습생으로서 100개의 도전적인 스테이지에서 실력을 증명할 것입니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a 2D platformer with a trainee idol theme, inspired by the classic gameplay of 'NS-Shaft'. You will play as an aspiring idol trainee, proving your skills on 100 challenging stages!
